item.title: Publishing My First Alexa Skill
item.description: A few weeks ago at work it was our quarterly Hackathon. After a dearth of ideas I thought of an idea to extend our Alexa app to incorporate something I’ve been working on in the office over the last few months. Over the course of a few days a colleague and I tweaked the skill and achieved our aim, which was pretty fun. Did I mention we also won the technical category?
